Lynn.Northshore Mall: The Northshore Mall is a shopping mall in Peabody, Massachusetts, located on Route 114. The mall is currently anchored by Nordstrom, Sears, J. C. Penney, and two Macy's locations. The mall is approximately 1.685 million ft² in size, and most of this space is located on one level, with the exception of the Nordstrom wing and most anchor stores.
